item.title: Aspose.BarCode for .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This article contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for .NET 24.1 (January 2024). All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38800 Update QualitySettings API structure Enhancement BARCODENET-38807 Add support of rMQR barcode Enhancement BARCODENET-38868 BarCodeReader could not find DotCode Bug Public API changes and backwards compatibility QualitySettings API New types: XDimensionMode (Auto/Small/Normal/Large/UseMinimalXDimension), BarcodeQualityMode (High/Normal/Low), DeconvolutionMode (Fast/Normal/Slow), InverseImageMode (Auto/Disabled/Enabled), ComplexBackgroundMode (Auto/Disabled/Enabled).
